p: Neonatal mice born from vaccinated female mice were exposed to a lethal EV71 challenge; every 1-day-old mouse was injected with 50 μL 10 LD 50 (0.5 × 10 7 TCID 50/mL) or 200 LD 50 (1 × 10 8 TCID 50/mL) of MP10 i.p., respectively. Nevertheless, the active immunized mice were subjected to a non-lethal dose EV71 challenge, and each two-week-old mouse was inoculated with 100 μL of MP10 (5 × 10 7 TCID 50/mL) i.p. The clinical scores were graded as described previously [ 32].
